Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: jockey shorts \jock"ey shorts`\ (j[o^]k"[=e] sh[^o]rts), n. pl. [from a Tradename.] A type of men's underpants without legs, fitting tightly and held by an elastic waistband; also called {briefs}. Originally a tradename, the term has become common for that type of underpants. [PJC]
briefs n : short tight-fitting underpants (trade name Jockey) [syn: {Jockey shorts}]
